resources.string:
Next bugfix release:
 · Fix: App crashing when trying to add log image from camera
 · Fix: Button to change map type not visible
 · Fix: Coordinate input field broken in DMS format
 · Fix: Arrows indicating submenus no longer shown
 · Fix: Action buttons on list select dialog might be not be completely visible on some phones
 
 
 2019.02.23:
 · Fix: Listing text no longer shown for caches from geocaching.com
 
 · New: Upgrade to higher target Android version as per Google requirements
 Click here for more info about reason for this change and known problems!
 · New: Better keyboard layout while searching for geocaches or trackables on the search activity
 · New: Show whether trackable has been discovered in the past
 · New: Support mapsforge style menus to select desired overlays
 · New: Add link to our users guide on About c:geo page
 · New: Improve color detection for cache listings to automatically switch to lighter background in case of need
 · New: Also support PNG and GIF as log pictures
 · New: Add user option to change max distance up to which brouter is used
 · New: Three colum mainscreen with up to two lines of text each
 · New: Garmin and Groundspeak waypoint IDs can coexist in the same GPX file
 · Fix: Remove outdated Navigon navigation application
 · Fix: Reorder menu items on logging screen to prevent accidental deletion of log
 · Fix: Waypoints on mapsforge map hidden already below configured limit
 Known issue:
 Waypoints from other lists might leak onto the map....we are working on it
 · Fix: Do not forget trackable visited state after device has been rotated on logging screen
 · Fix: Accept mapsforge maps above V3 during offline map file selection
 · Fix: Update links to terms of use and other help pages
 · Fix: Distance parsing for projection in some locales
 · Fix: Wrong error message if basic member tries to open PMO-cache
 · Fix: Hide opencaching waypoints with 0 coordinates
 · Fix: Update OKAPI waypoint types
 · Fix: Avoid doubled OKAPI authentication, which might fail then
 · Fix: Added check for actual username when logging a cache
